EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_ Cloud Native Java Workshop_NYC_Q415.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited to a hands-on Cloud Native Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nyc> Wednesday, December 16, 2015 625 Avenue of the Americas
Second Floor
New York, NY 10011 REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nyc> Join Pivotal for a One-Day Workshop Join Pivotal for a hands-on workshop to introduce key concepts in cloud native application delivery. The workshop will cover patterns to enable highly available resilient services building microservice architectures with Spring and NetflixOSS. Learn production ready techniques for developing and deploying Spring Boot and Spring Cloud with dynamic configuration, service discovery, circuit breakers and client side load balancing. Register <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nyc> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. AGENDA
8:30 AM - 10:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
10:00 AM - 11:00 AM The Cloud Native Advantage
11:00 AM - 12:30 PM Cloud Native Java Bootcamp
12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Lunch
1:30 PM - 4:00 PM Cloud Native Java Patterns VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nyc>
